Interactive COnversational memory Networ.from sentence: We propose Interactive COnversational memory Network ( ICON ) , a multimodal network for identifying emotions in utterance - videos .

extracts.from sentence: First , it extracts multimodal features from all utterancevideos .

test utterance.from sentence: Next , given a test utterance to be classified , ICON considers the preceding utterances of both speakers falling within a context - window and models their self - emotional influences using local gated recurrent units .

to incorporate.from sentence: Furthermore , to incorporate inter -speaker influences , a global representation is generated using a GRU that intakes output of the local GRUs .

each instance.from sentence: For each instance in the context - window , the output of this global GRU is stored as a memory cell .

memories.from sentence: These memories are then subjected to multiple read / write cycles that include attention mechanism for generating contextual summaries of the conversational history .

each iteration.from sentence: At each iteration , the representation of the test utterance is improved with this summary representation and finally used for prediction .
